short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take Note is a chrome extension that allows you to take notes and manage your notes with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take Note is your go-to Chrome extension for effortlessly capturing, organizing, and analyzing web content. Say goodbye to scattered bookmarks and messy notesâ€”Take Note streamlines your research process, making it easy to save valuable information from any webpage.

Features:

Instant Data Capture: Select and save data from any webpage instantly with a simple click. Whether it's a quote, an image, or an entire article, Take Note ensures you never miss a beat.

Organize with Folders: Create folders to categorize your notes based on projects, topics, or interests. Keep your notes neatly organized and easily accessible for future reference.

Tagging System: Add tags to your folders and notes for enhanced categorization and quick retrieval. Tagging makes it effortless to find the information you need, exactly when you need it.

Commenting Feature (Coming Soon): Collaborate and add context to your notes by leaving comments within folders or individual notes. Share insights, brainstorm ideas, and communicate with your team directly within Take Note.

AI Analysis (Coming Soon): Unlock deeper insights from your notes with AI-powered analysis. Let Take Note analyze entire folders to uncover trends, patterns, and correlations, helping you gain valuable insights from your collected data.

AI Conversations (Coming Soon): Initiate AI-driven conversations with your notes. Whether you want to brainstorm ideas, ask questions, or explore concepts further, Take Note's AI chat feature is your virtual assistant ready to assist.

How It Works:

Capture: Simply select the data you want to save from any webpage and a take note popup will appear with the folders you have created, click on of them. thats it.

Organize: Create folders and add tags to categorize your notes based on your preferences.

Analyze (Coming Soon): Let Take Note analyze your notes with AI to uncover hidden insights and patterns.

Collaborate (Coming Soon): Add comments to your notes for enhanced collaboration and context-sharing with your team.

Converse (Coming Soon): Start AI-driven conversations with your notes to explore ideas, ask questions, and gain deeper insights.

Start Taking Notes Like Never Before with Take Note!

Get ready to revolutionize your web research and note-taking experience with Take Note. Stay tuned for our upcoming features, including AI analysis and conversational capabilities, designed to take your productivity to the next level. Download Take Note today and streamline your knowledge management effortlessly.


What's New:
- Now use the extension in offline mode(no login required)
- Updated UI for selector
- Updated the popup position algorithm


NOTE: If you save data in offline mode and then login all data will be removed same goes for online mode
